void stp_handle_message ( const MsgBuffer *  msg  ) 

Handles IPC message in the Scripted Test Process way.

Parameters:
msg [in] message to be handled.

LOCAL void stp_handle_run ( const MsgBuffer *  msg  ) 

Handles MSG_RUN command.

Parameters:
msg [in] message that comes through IPC.
This function runs a test function provided by the end user. The return value of that function is picked as a test result and is send through IPC in MSG_RET message.
